changeSet.author: adilbek
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE charm ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT, energy FLOAT, actual SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 )

changeSet.author: adilbek
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE client ( id SERIAL, surname VARCHAR(255), name VARCHAR(255), patronymic VARCHAR(255), gender VARCHAR(255), birth_date DATE, charm_id INTEGER, actual SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, cia_id varchar(255) unique, PRIMARY KEY (id), FOREIGN KEY (charm_id) REFERENCES charm(id) );

changeSet.author: adilbek
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE client_phone ( client INTEGER, type VARCHAR(255), number VARCHAR(255), actual SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, PRIMARY KEY (client, type), FOREIGN KEY (client) REFERENCES client(id) )

changeSet.author: adilbek
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE client_address ( client INTEGER, type VARCHAR(255), street VARCHAR(255), house VARCHAR(255), flat VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (client, type), actual SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, FOREIGN KEY (client) REFERENCES client(id) )

changeSet.author: adilbek
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE client_account ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, client INTEGER, money FLOAT, number VARCHAR(255) unique, registered_at DATE, actual SMALLINT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, FOREIGN KEY (client) REFERENCES client(id) )

changeSet.author: adilbek
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE transaction_type ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, code varchar(255), name varchar(255) unique )

changeSet.author: adilbek
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE client_account_transaction ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, account integer, money float, finished_at date, type integer, FOREIGN KEY (type) REFERENCES transaction_type(id), FOREIGN KEY (account) REFERENCES client_account(id) )
